tag_list: wedding-florist, master-florist, wedding-coordination, wedding-planning, fredericksburg, texas
overview:
I am a master florist and event coordinator/designer located in the historic district of picturesque Fredericksburg, Texas.

I am an eventeur as well as event florist, that is, I specialize in unique turn-key wedding planning and event design, with custom artistic props, theatrical lighting, coordination, vendor sourcing and direction. I have been in business for over 14 years now …to date, I’ve done over 400 weddings. I have a background in studio art at U.T. Austin and Laguna Gloria as well as certification as a Texas Master Florist and work by appointment only ~ so it continues to be a joy.

Besides a passion for flowers, I love the immediacy and conceptual art that all great celebrations have in common.
